item.description:
Hi all,
Our October meet-up will be October 1, 2011 at 2:00pm
Alexandra Morgan's Animal School
84 Cutler St.
Warren, RI 02885
401-434-3687
Admission is $5

**For those of you attending the meet-ups, please don't forget to bring your pug's medical paperwork including a stool sample result testing negative for Coccidia AND Giardia.**
Snacks, refreshments & "Pug Fudge" will be served as always! And if you need any info. on Pug training, boarding or daycare, Alexandra will be happy to answer any questions you may have.

group.who: The East Bay Pug Meet-up Group
